meta.content: The mission of the Greenfield Public Schools is to educate students to meet the challenges and responsibilities of a rapidly changing and diverse world.

div.h1: Important Guidance and Resources Regarding the Coronavirus

span.content: Important Guidance and Resources Regarding the Coronavirus

img.alt: guidance and resources for coronovirus banner updated 2

div.p: The Greenfield Public Schools is committed to the health and safety of its students, families, and staff. GPS works closely with Public Health officials and the City of Greenfield to carry out pro-active measures for the wellness of our school community. Please familiarize yourself with the important information and resources below. Thank you!

p.strong: This page will be updated frequently as new information becomes available.

h2.strong: Greenfield Public Schools Remote Learning Plan (click here to view it)

div.p: The Greenfield Public Schools is pleased to release the GPS Remote Learning plan, and wishes to thank all those teachers, parents, administrators, and community members who provided feedback and worked hard to collaborate on this document. Please click here for a joint statement regarding the Remote Learning Plan from the Superintendent, Greenfield School Committee, and Greenfield Education Association.
*Полный перевод этого документа будет выпущен в ближайшее время
Письмо суперинтенданта на русском языке | Часто задаваемые вопросы
*Traducere completă a acestui document va fi eliberată în curand
Scrisoare de la Superintendent în limba română | Întrebări frecvente
*La traducción completa de este documento se publicará en breve
Carta del superintendente en español | Preguntas Hechas Frecuentemente
Carta del superintendente en español | Preguntas Hechas Frecuentemente

div.p: This website works best with Internet Explorer 9+ and the latest versions of Chrome, Firefox, and Safari. If you are seeing this message, you are using an unsupported browser which may cause this website to not function and display correctly. Please view in a different browser or update your current one to get the full experience of this website.
